snippet: Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion last week against Buffalo, remains questionable for Sunday’s game at Pittsburgh.
abstract: New York Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion in game against Buffalo Bills, remains questionable for upcoming game against Pittsburgh Steelers.
lead_paragraph: Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, who sustained a concussion last week against Buffalo, remains questionable for Sunday’s game at Pittsburgh.

headline.seo: Jets’ Revis Is Pedaling But Stuck In Place
headline.main: Jets’ Revis Is Pedaling but Stuck in Place
headline.print_headline: Jets’ Revis Is Pedaling But Stuck In Place
